ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:1.2_0: At that time the nun Thullanandā gave the full admission to her disciples, but then, for the next two years, neither guided them nor had them guided.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:1.4_0: and they did not know what was allowable and what was not.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:1.5_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:1.6_0: “How can Venerable Thullanandā give the full admission to her disciples, and then neither guide them nor have them guided for two years?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:1.7_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā does this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:1.10_0: “... How can the nun Thullanandā do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:1.11_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:1.12_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:1.13.1_0: ‘If a nun gives the full admission to her disciple, and then, for the next two years, neither guides her nor has her guided, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:2.1.12_0: One should not instruct them to teach Dhamma talk.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:2.1.14_0: she does not ask anyone else to take her away.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:2.1.15_0: If she thinks, “I’ll neither guide her nor have her guided for two years,” then by the mere fact of giving up her duty, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:2.2.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:2.2.3_0: if she searches, but does not find anyone to invite for correction;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:2.2.7_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:2.2.8_0: The eighth training rule is finished.
